Accountant

Accountant Opening - Houston, TX


Our recruitment firm is seeking trustworthy Accountant to work for our client, a global manufacturing company. To ensure success, the Accountant should be prompt, honest, detail-oriented, professional, and analytical. Candidates should have a firm grasp of accounting and financial practices and regulations and possess strong computer skills. If you are looking for a career change with a great team environment, this is the job for you!






Accountant Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Maintain general ledger
  • Prepare budgets
  • Financial reconciliation
  • Profit and loss for multiple entities
  • Perform month end closing
  • Report Sales Tax monthly
  • Maintain Account Receivable
  • Code Account payable for all vendors' bills

Accountant Preferred Education, Experience, & Requirements:

  • Bachelor's in accounting
  • 2-5 years of relevant experience in Accounting
  • Proficient with MS Office products including excellent Excel skills
  • Microsoft Dynamics preferred
  • Great communication skills
  • Team player
